msbt.message: Oh my! That's a lot flashier than I was expectin' it to be. This is gonna be something else, !
What a ruckus! I can't even hear myself think over this noise. Unless I'm thinkin' of fireworks, that is.
It's like a blooming flower painting the night sky.<10_4 /> Whoa! That came out more poetical than I was intendin'.
I like it best when they're goin' off one after another. Make that sky dazzle, !

Here's a notion. If you need to get a big secret off your chest, try yellin' it out just as a firework goes off.Even if nobody else hears you over the noise, it's still good practice for if you ever wanna say it for real.
Whoa! That one was huge! Did you see it, ?You can't take your eyes off the sky even for a second. There's so much goin' on up there, !
If you don't mind missin' a tiny bit of the show, take a second to look around at the others, .If you ask me, the look of wonder on the faces down here is as much a treat as the fireworks up there.
I don't think I've ever met anyone who's taken a photo of fireworks they ended up likin', .Still, I was told the NookPhone had a fancy camera of some type, so maybe it's worth tryin' to snap a few!
Hard to believe the show's almost over, but I'm glad you were able to come out and enjoy it, .
How can the fireworks almost be done? I was just startin' to get into it, .
Been enjoyin' the fireworks, kiddo?<10_4 /> Actually, don't answer that. Your smile is all the answer I need.
